articles.title: Kenny DeLand Jr., formerly missing American college student, reunites with mother - WGAL Susquehanna Valley Pa.
articles.description: American college student Kenny DeLand Jr. was reported missing more than two weeks ago in France.
articles.content: LYON, France —American college student Kenny DeLand Jr. has been reunited with his mother in Lyon, France, and is expected to return to the United States soon, according to a French diplomatic source… [+1003 chars]
